text:
Anupam Kher @6million on Twitter

Veteran Actor Anupam Kher is “happy” after scoring six million followers on micro-blogging website Twitter.

The 60-year-old actor also “thanked” his fans and well-wishers for being a part of his Twitter “journey”.

“Happy to reach 6 Million Friends, Fans, Critics, Admirers, Advisers and Followers. Thank You for being part of my Journey. Love you All,” Anupam tweeted on Thursday night.

Anupam keeps his fans and followers entertained by frequently sharing photographs of himself and tweeting his thoughts. — IANS
title: Anupam Kher celebrates six million Twitter followers
